Pre-Game Insights: The Heat averaged 12.7 turnovers per game last season, which is T-5th-lowest in the NBA; the Suns forced 12.7 turnovers per game last season, which is 7th-lowest in the NBA.

The Suns allowed opponents to shoot 33% from three in close and late situations last season, which is 10th-best in the NBA; the Heat shot 32% from three in close and late situations last season, which is 2nd-worst in the NBA.
